flawed_nl_solution:
On weekdays it earns $600/weekday * 5 weekdays = $<<600*5=30000>>30000
During the weekend it earns twice as much each day so it makes ($600 * 2)/weekend day * 2 weekend days = $<<(600*2)*2=2400>>2400
Every week it earns $30000 + $2400 = $<<30000+2400=32400>>32400
By the end of the month, it earns $32400/week * 4 weeks = $129600
#### 129600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3000, not 30000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
